alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 05 at 9:12PM CDT until May 05 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Eastern Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hayes Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Frontier and eastern Hayes Counties, including the following locations... Marengo and Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
